core.name: Life, an empty dream
core.description:
(Test v1) Leader Bonus:
Team SP recovery +25%, attacks against frozen enemies gain Total DMG +35%.

subskills.name: Life, an empty dream
subskills.description: (Test v1) Team SP recovery +25%, attacks against frozen enemies gain Total DMG +35%.

core.name: Combo ATK: Can, give me a hand!
core.description:
(Test v1) Combo ATK varies with Can's mood
Angry mood: [Double Scratch] deal 500% ATK Ice DMG.
Super Cute: [Ice Can] deal 300% ATK of ice DMG.

subskills.name: Meow~
subskills.description: (Test v1) Entry via QTE fully restore both mood meter.

subskills.name: Use both paws
subskills.description:
(Test v1)
When casting [Double Scratch], Total DMG +30.0% for 12s, can be refreshed.
When [Ice Can] hits, enemy take 30% more Total DMG for 12s, can be refreshed.

subskills.name: Fishing
subskills.description: (Test v1) [Double Scratch] restore 3 sp to entire team.

core.name: Boss
core.description:
(Test v1) Pardofelis will be assisted by her cat partner Can. Can has two moods during battle, [Angry] and [Super Cute]. Different mood will determine Can's support effect. Each mood has its own mood meter, max 100 points limit.
1st-4th Basic ATK : restore 20 points
5th Basic ATK : restore 100 points
When you switch in, Can's mood switches back to [Angry].

Phyllis uses chakram as dual blades and gain weapon skill Neko Neko Attack: deal 125% x 3 ATK Ice DMG and switches Can's mood.
This skill has max 2 charges, CD: 6s.

subskills.name: Bluff
subskills.description: (Test v1) Restore all weapon charge when entering [Ready to Flee] state (Ult)

subskills.name: Freezing point
subskills.description: (Test v1) Entire team attack against frozen enemies gain Total DMG +25%

core.name: Go, Can!
core.description:
(Test v1) Can passes through Phyllis Ring and becomes huge. Deal 2000% ATK Ice DMG, restore full mood meter, and enter [Ready to Flee] state for 10 seconds.
In [Ready to Flee] state, both Combo ATK gain Ice DMG +50%. When weapon skill is used and mood changes, restore full meter of the current mood.
[Ready to Flee] status ends when character leave and reenters.

subskills.name: Hey, hurry up!
subskills.description: (Test v1) In [Ready to Flee] state, self Ice DMG +40%. When Ult hits IMG enemies, if the Nihilus Seed HP is below 20%, insta-kill the enemy (or the current phase).

subskills.name: OK, ready to flee!
subskills.description: (Test v1) After using ult, all valks in the team restore 3 sp for 10s.

core.name: If you can't fight it, run
core.description:
(Test v1) Evade enemyâ€™s attack by quickly shifting position, can consecutively evade 2 times.
After ultimate evasion can trigger 3s time fracture, CD: 15s.

subskills.name: Sneak
subskills.description: (Test v1) After triggering evasion skill, fully restores mood meter.

core.name: Hit me if you can
core.description:
(Test v1) 1st Sequence: 100% ATK of Ice DMG
2nd Sequence: 100% ATK of Ice DMG
3rd Sequence: 50% + 50% x 3 ATK of Ice DMG
4th Sequence: 120% ATK of Ice DMG
5th Sequence: 200% ATK of Ice DMG

subskills.name: QTE: Here comes the cat
subskills.description: (Test v1) QTE: Triggered by time slow. Deal 225.0% x 4 ATK ice DMG. Decrease the preceeding valk switch CD by 4s.

subskills.name: Neko Attack
subskills.description: (Test v1) For every 2 Combo ATK casted by the character, tap weapon skill to use [Rapid Strike]. Deals 200% x 4 ATK Ice DMG, additionally charges Rime Trauma, This attack counts as QTE, can directly link to 4th Basic ATK sequence. Using this skill triggers weapon skill effect.

core.name: Survival of the weak
core.description:
(Test v1) On exit, Can will remain on field to support the team.
When Pardofelis exits the field, Can will dig for treasures on field, after 2s will throw a [Neko Bomb] towards enemies, deal 900% ATK Ice DMG, additionally applying Rime Trauma, and restore 10 SP for Pardofelis. In [Ready to Bounce] state, [Neko Bomb] will deal additional 900% ATK Ice DMG.

subskills.name: Play nice
subskills.description: (Test v1) [Double Scratch] skill additionally restores 40 mood points for [Angry] mood. [Ice Can] additionally restores 40 mood points for [Super Cute] mood. Combo ATK Ice DMG +25.0%.

subskills.name: One step ahead
subskills.description: (Test v1) Increase weapon skill charge by 1

subskills.name: Make friends
subskills.description: (Test v1) Attacks that involve Can (including QTE, Combo ATK, ultimate), will provide team with one stack of Total DMG +5.0%, max 3 stacks, last 16s, can be refreshed.
